description: IV-SDK .NET allows you to create and run scripts for GTA IV in any .NET language out there!
releaseNotes:
⚠️ CONTAINS BREAKING CHANGES ⚠️
		1. Added plugin system for the IV-SDK .NET Manager. Check out the wiki to find more about plugins (https://github.com/ClonkAndre/IV-SDK-DotNet/wiki/Plugins).
		2. Added “IVPedIntelligence”, “IVPedIntelligenceNY”, “IVPedTasks” and “IVPedFlags4” classes.
		3. Added “IVControlledByInfo” struct.
		4. Added “OnRenderCorona”, “OnGetTrafficLightState1” and “OnGetTrafficLightState2” events to “GameHooks” class.
		5. Added “RenderCorona" function to “IVShadows” class (This function will probably be moved somewhere else in the future).
		6. Added “eTimeCycleParam” and “eTrafficLightState” enums.
		7. Added “GetSingleTimeCycleParameter” and “SetSingleTimeCycleParameter” functions to “IVTimeCycle” class.
		8. Added “DeletePed” function to “IVPedFactoryNY” class.
		9. Added “DeleteVehicle” function to “IVVehicleFactoryNY” class.
		10. Added “IsSimple” and “GetTaskType” functions to “IVTask” class.
		11. Added natives: “IS_SNIPER_BULLET_IN_AREA” and “GET_CAM_STATE”.
		12. Added Vector3 overload to natives: “IS_BULLET_IN_AREA”, “IS_BULLET_IN_BOX”, “IS_PROJECTILE_IN_AREA” and “CREATE_MISSION_TRAIN”.
		13. Added Color overload to native: “UPDATE_PTFX_TINT”.
		14. Added new overload to “BeginPopupContextItem” function in “ImGuiIV” class.
		15. Added new overload to “CreatePed” function in “IVPedFactoryNY” class.
		16. Added new overload to “CreateVehicle” function in “IVVehicleFactoryNY” class.
		17. Added new overload to “GetAddress” function in “Patterns” class within the “Hooking” namespace.
		18. Changed the paramater type(s) of natives: “IS_STREAMING_ADDITIONAL_TEXT”, “STOP_PTFX”, “EVOLVE_PTFX”, “SHUTDOWN_AND_LAUNCH_NETWORK_GAME” and “CREATE_MISSION_TRAIN” to be an integer instead of an unsigned integer.
		19. Changed the parameter type of function “CreatePed” within “IVPedFactoryNY” class to be “IVControlledByInfo” instead of “IVSpawnData”.
		20. Renamed property “_f3” from “IVPedFlags2” class to “IsWantedByPolice”.
		21. Renamed property “_f5” from “IVPedFlags2” class to “IsDruggedUp”.
		22. Renamed property “_f13” from “IVPedFlags2” class to “IsEnemy”.
		23. Renamed property “_f14” from “IVPedFlags” class to “IsBleeding”.
		24. Removed “IVSpawnData” struct in favor of the “IVControlledByInfo” struct.
		25. Fixed the “ImGuiIV.IsKeyXXX” functions not working unless there is an active ImGui window opened.
		26. Fixed mouse cursor jumping back and forth when resolution was not 1920x1080.
		27. The “DoNotLoadLegacyScripts” option in the IV-SDK .NET settings file is now set to “false” by default.
		28. The “PedIntelligence” property of  the “IVPed” class now returns a new instance of the “IVPedIntelligenceNY” class.
		29. The “PedIntelligence” pool can now be accessed.
		30. The IV-SDK .NET Inspector now shows fields which are of type: “System.Collections.Generic.List” and “System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary” (It also shows the content of those collections)
		31. Updated XML comments.
title: IV-SDK .NET
